gamerule.bat_ecology:roost_range.descrip: Maximum distance bats will search for a roosting spot (blocks)
gamerule.bat_ecology:guano_rate.descript: Chance of guano drop per 1000 ticks (permille)
gamerule.bat_ecology:swarm_max.descripti: Maximum number of bats in a swarm group
gamerule.bat_ecology:pollinate_chance.de: Pollination success rate when orbiting lanterns (1/x per second)
gamerule.bat_ecology:max_colony_scale.de: Maximum visual scale for large colonies (150 = 1.5x)
